workers.commandLine: python $rootdir/train.py $rootdir/$datadir -s src -t tgt --max-tokens 4000 -a $arch --share-all-embeddings --dropout 0.31782273613388523 --optimizer adam --adam-betas '(0.9, 0.98)' --clip-norm 0.03779110953751519 --weight-decay 0.00011713191277330926 --lr 0.0005377072599190306 --lr-scheduler cosine --warmup-init-lr 1e-7 --warmup-updates 98887 --max-lr 0.0005777997946001693 --min-lr 1e-09 --t-mult 0.33384019163791323 --criterion label_smoothed_cross_entropy --label-smoothing 0.16316239860694048 --max-update 350000 --max-epoch 10 --save-dir $PHILLY_JOB_DIRECTORY --tensorboard-logdir $PHILLY_SCRATCH_DIRECTORY
